overview.role_description:
1. Zani is a Spectro main DPS and the core of Spectro Frazzle teams, dealing primarily Heavy Attack DMG and Spectro DMG.
2. Zani can instantly trigger the team's [Spectro Frazzle] and convert it into her own energy, enabling a stable combat cycle.
3. Some of Zani's skills stagnate enemies. Most of her skills offer Block/DMG Reduction, creating a safe window for sustained DPS and boosting her survivability.
4. Zani comes with a strong [Spectro Frazzle] DMG bonus, significantly enhancing her DMG potential.
overview.synopsis:
1. Tip: Apply [Spectro Frazzle] via teammates to convert into [Blaze]. Build up [Redundant Energy] with Basic Attacks. Use enhanced Resonance Skill to further charge [Blaze]. Activate Resonance Liberation and chain Basic Attacks to consume Blaze, then finish with enhanced Resonance Liberation before switching out.
2. Rotation: Intro Skill + 5A- Enhanced E-R1-3A*2-R2
3. Team Comp: When Zani is main DPS, the most suitable sub-DPS is Phoebe. The team setup of Zani + Phoebe + Shorekeeper works well. Please refer to the full guide for team rotation.
overview.rotation:
Skill Breakdown
1. Forte Circuit
With Zani in the team, whenever an allied unit applies [Spectro Frazzle] to an enemy, it immediately triggers DMG and converts the stacks into equal amount of [Heliacal Ember] (up to 60 stacks), enabling the set bonus from [Eternal Radiance]. At the same time, Zani gains Forte Gauge [Blaze].
While in the Inferno Mode, Zani unlocks Heavy Slash skills, treated as both Heavy Attack DMG and [Spectro Frazzle] DMG. Using these skills will consume [Blaze].
● [Blaze]: Up to 100 outside Inferno Mode. Up to 150 during Inferno Mode. Cast Targeted Action/Forcible Riposte to obtain 10 points. 5 points per stack when [Spectro Frazzle] converts into [Heliacal Ember]. 50 points upon using Resonance Liberation - Rekindle.
● [Redundant Energy]: Max cap is 100. Gain: Hit with Basic Attack/Intro Skill/Pinpoint Strike. Cast standard Resonance Skill. Cannot gain [Redundant Energy] while in Inferno Mode.
2. Resonance Liberation
Deals Spectro DMG and enters Inferno Mode.
● Inferno Mode: Basic Attack multiplier increases. When [Blaze] drops below 30 or Inferno Mode lasts for 8 seconds, the Resonance Liberation will upgrade to an enhanced version. Casting the enhanced version exits Inferno Mode.
3. Resonance Skill
● Standard Defense Protocol: Attack and enter block state. Afterward, press Basic Attack briefly to chain into the 3rd hit, capable of stagnating enemies. Taking DMG during the block reduces incoming DMG, stagnates nearby enemies, triggers a Pinpoint Strike.
● Crisis Response Protocol: Available when [Redundant Energy] is full and Zani is not in Inferno Mode. Performed by holding the Resonance Skill to block. During the block, releasing the skill or when the duration ends, she will consume all [Redundant Energy] to perform Targeted Action. If attacked during the block, Zani will reduce DMG, stagnate nearby enemies, and consume all [Redundant Energy] to perform Forcible Riposte.
4. Normal Attack
● Basic Attack: 4-hit combo + one [Breakthrough]. A1-A2-A3-A (Breakthrough) - A4. In Inferno Mode, A3 can stagnate enemies.
● Heavy Attack: Consumes STA to deal Spectro DMG, followed by 3rd hit of Basic Attack.
● Mid-air Attack: Consumes STA to perform a Plunging Attack, followed by 3rd hit of Basic Attack.
● Dodge Counter: After a successful dodge, perform a Basic Attack, followed by 3rd hit of Basic Attack.
5. Intro Skill
Attacks the target, dealing Spectro DMG.
6. Outro Skill
Attacks the target, dealing Spectro DMG. All [Heliacal Ember] stacks are cleared, and the DMG is increased based on the number of [Heliacal Ember] stacks (considered as Spectro Frazzle DMG). Teammates deal increased Spectro DMG for 20 seconds to enemies with [Heliacal Ember].
Team Comp Analysis: Zani can instantly trigger [Spectro Frazzle] DMG and convert stack count into her startup energy, making her the core of Spectro Negative Status comps. She pairs best with characters who can reliably apply [Spectro Frazzle].
Team Comp & Rotation:
In the following rotations: A = Basic Attack; H = Heavy Attack; E = Resonance Skill; R = Resonance Liberation; Q = Echo Skill.
● Zani + Phoebe + Shorekeeper
Phoebe maintains Confession mode (Support mode) at all times, efficiently stacking [Spectro Frazzle] on enemies. Her Outro Skill reduces Spectro RES. Shorekeeper boosts Crit. Rate & Crit. DMG and provides healing.
① Shorekeeper 4AH*2-ERQ. Achieve full Concerto Energy and swap out;
② Phoebe takes the field with Intro Skill + Held E-3AH*2-RQ. Achieve full Concerto Energy and swap out;
③ Zani takes the field with Intro Skill + 5A - Held E -R1-3A*2-R2. Achieve full Concerto Energy and swap out;
④ Shorekeeper enters with Intro Skill and repeats the previous rotation.
● Zani + Phoebe + Spectro Rover
Both Phoebe and Spectro Rover apply [Spectro Frazzle]. Phoebe's Outro Skill reduces Spectro RES, and Spectro Rover gains additional Spectro RES reduction at S6.
① Spectro Rover HAA-EA-RQ-HAA without achieving full Concerto Energy;
② Phoebe Held E-3AH*2-EE-3A*2-Q. Achieve full Concerto Energy and swap out;
③ Zani takes the field with Intro Skill + 5A - Held E -R1-3A. Achieve full Concerto Energy and swap out;
④ Phoebe R;
⑤ Spectro Rover EA;
⑥ Zani 3A*2-R2. Achieve full Concerto Energy and swap out.
● Zani + Spectro Rover + Shorekeeper/Verina/Baizhi
Spectro Rover applies [Spectro Frazzle] and gains additional Spectro RES reduction at S6, with the survival role providing healing or DMG bonus.
① Healer quickly fully charges Concerto Energy;
③ Spectro Rover enters with Intro Skill + EA-HAA-EA-RQ. Achieve full Concerto Energy and swap out;
③ Zani takes the field with Intro Skill + 5A - Held E -R1-3A*2-R2. Achieve full Concerto Energy and swap out;
④ Healer enters with Intro Skill and repeats the previous rotation.
● Zani + Ciaccona + Shorekeeper/Verina
Ciaccona applies Spectro Frazzle from the off-field, while the sustain unit offers healing and buffs.
① Ciaccona starts with 4A - Dodge - 4A - R - Tap yellow button without achieving full Concerto Energy;
② Healer fully charges Concerto Energy and leaves.
③ Zani takes the field with Intro Skill + 5A-E without achieving full Concerto Energy;
④ Ciaccona enters with 4A-E- Enhanced H to fully charge Concerto Energy and leaves;
⑤ Zani takes the field with Intro Skill + R1-3A*2-R2. Achieve full Concerto Energy and swap out;

texts.name: Blazing Justice
texts.effectDescription: Increases ATK by (12%/15%/18%/21%/24%). Casting Basic Attack grants the following effects: Dealing damage ignores (8%/10%/12%/14%/16%) of the target's DEF and Amplifies Spectro Frazzle DMG dealt by (50%/62.5%/75%/87.5%/100%) for (6/6/6/6/6)s. Retriggering the effect resets its duration.

texts.name: Tragicomedy
texts.effectDescription: Increases ATK by (12%/15%/18%/21%/24%). Every time Basic Attack or Intro Skill is cast, Heavy Attack DMG Bonus increases by (48%/60%/72%/84%/96%) for (3/3/3/3/3)s.

texts.name: Legend of Drunken Hero
texts.effectDescription: Dealing DMG to enemies with Negative Statuses increases the wielder's ATK by (4%/5%/6%/7%/8%) for (10/10/10/10/10)s. This effect can be triggered 1 time per second, stackable up to (4/4/4/4/4) times.

texts.name: Celestial Spiral
texts.effectDescription: Casting the Resonance Skill grants (6/7/8/9/10) Resonance Energy and increases ATK by (10%/12.5%/15%/17.5%/20%), lasting for (16/16/16/16/16)s. This effect can be triggered once every (20/20/20/20/20)s.

texts.name: Capitaneus
texts.skillDescription:
Summon a Capitaneus to jump up and smash enemies, dealing 118.80% Spectro DMG. This attack generates 4 extra Merciless Judgements, each dealing 59.40% Spectro DMG.

The Resonator with this Echo equipped in their main slot gains 12.00% Spectro DMG Bonus and 12.00% Heavy Attack DMG Bonus.

CD: 20s.

texts.name: Eternal Radiance
texts.description: Inflicting Spectro Frazzle on enemies increases Crit. Rate by 20% for 15s. Attacking enemies inflicted with 10 stacks of Spectro Frazzle grants 15% Spectro DMG Bonus for 15s.

texts.name: Eternal Radiance
texts.description: Spectro DMG + 10%

texts.name: Capitaneus
texts.skillDescription:
Summon a Capitaneus to jump up and smash enemies, dealing 118.80% Spectro DMG. This attack generates 4 extra Merciless Judgements, each dealing 59.40% Spectro DMG.

The Resonator with this Echo equipped in their main slot gains 12.00% Spectro DMG Bonus and 12.00% Heavy Attack DMG Bonus.

CD: 20s.

texts.name: Eternal Radiance
texts.description: Spectro DMG + 10%

texts.name: Celestial Light
texts.description: Spectro DMG + 10%.

texts.name: Luminous Hymn
texts.effectDescription: Increase ATK by (12%/15%/18%/21%/24%). Dealing DMG to targets with Spectro Frazzle grants the wielder (14%/17.5%/21%/24.5%/28%) Basic Attack DMG Bonus and (14%/17.5%/21%/24.5%/28%) Heavy Attack DMG Bonus, stacking up to (3/3/3/3/3) {Cus:Sap,S=time P=times SapTag=2} for (6/6/6/6/6)s. Casting Outro Skill Amplifies the Spectro Frazzle DMG on targets around the active Resonator by (30%/37.5%/45%/52.5%/60%) for (30/30/30/30/30)s. Effects of the same name cannot be stacked.

texts.name: Nightmare: Mourning Aix
texts.skillDescription:
Summon a Nightmare: Mourning Aix to attack surrounding enemies, dealing 273.60% Spectro DMG. DMG dealt to enemies inflicted by Spectro Frazzle is increased by 100.00%.

The Resonator with this Echo equipped in their main slot gains 12.00% Spectro DMG Bonus.

CD: 25s.

texts.name: Eternal Radiance
texts.description: Inflicting Spectro Frazzle on enemies increases Crit. Rate by 20% for 15s. Attacking enemies inflicted with 10 stacks of Spectro Frazzle grants 15% Spectro DMG Bonus for 15s.

texts.name: Stellar Symphony
texts.effectDescription: Increase HP by (12%/15%/18%/21%/24%). Restore (8/10/12/14/16) Concerto Energy when casting Resonance Liberation. This effect can be triggered (1/1/1/1/1) time(s) every (20/20/20/20/20)s. When casting Resonance Skill that heals, increase nearby party members' ATK by (14%/17.5%/21%/24.5%/28%) for (30/30/30/30/30)s. Effects of the same name cannot be stacked.

texts.name: Fallacy of No Return
texts.skillDescription:
Activate the Echo Skill to summon a fraction of the Fallacy of No Return's power and deal a blast to the surrounding area, inflicting Spectro DMG equal to 15.86% of max HP, after which the Resonator gains 10% bonus Energy Regen and all team members 10% bonus ATK for 20s.

Hold Echo Skill to unleash a series of flurry assaults at the cost of STA, each dealing Spectro DMG equal to 1.58% of max HP; Release to end the assail in a powerful blow, dealing Spectro DMG equal to 19.82% of max HP.

CD: 20s

texts.name: Rejuvenating Glow
texts.description: Increases the ATK of all party members by 15% for 30s upon healing allies.

texts.name: Quick Response
texts.description: Casting Intro Skill Immediate Execution gives 12% Spectro DMG Bonus for 14s.

texts.name: Fear No Pain
texts.description: When in Ready Stance, all DMG taken is reduced by 20%.

texts.name: Beacon For the Future
texts.description: Attack the target, dealing Spectro DMG equal to 150% of Zani's ATK and removing all stacks of Heliacal Ember inflicted upon the target. Each stack increases the DMG dealt by 10%. This DMG is considered Spectro Frazzle DMG. The Spectro DMG dealt by other Resonators in the team to the target marked by Heliacal Ember is Amplified by 20% for 20s.

texts.name: Routine Negotiation
texts.description:
Basic Attack

Perform up to 4 consecutive attacks to deal Spectro DMG.

After performing Basic Attack Stage 3, {Cus:Ipt,Touch=tap PC=press Gamepad=press} Normal Attack at the right time to perform Basic Attack Breakthrough, which can be followed by Basic Attack Stage 4 by {Cus:Ipt,Touch=tapping PC=pressing Gamepad=pressing} Normal Attack again.



Heavy Attack

Consume STA to attack the target, dealing Spectro DMG. {Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} Normal Attack within a certain time to perform Basic Attack Stage 3.



Mid-air Attack

Consume STA to perform a plunging attack, dealing Spectro DMG. {Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} Normal Attack within a certain time to perform Basic Attack Stage 3.



Dodge Counter

{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} Normal Attack within a certain time after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing Spectro DMG. Then {Cus:Ipt,Touch=tap PC=press Gamepad=press} Normal Attack at the right time to cast Basic Attack Breakthrough.

texts.name: Restless Watch
texts.description:
Standard Defense Protocol

Attack the target to deal Spectro DMG and enter a block stance. This state ends early if Zani is switched off the field. {Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} Normal Attack within a certain time to perform Basic Attack Stage 3, recovering 10 points of Redundant Energy and Stagnating the target on hit.

When attacked by an enemy while in block stance, reduce this instance of damage by 100% and Stagnate nearby targets, then cast Pinpoint Strike, dealing Spectro DMG and further reducing their Vibration Strength by 5%. DMG taken by Zani is reduced by 30% within the next 2s.



Crisis Response Protocol

When Zani is not in Inferno Mode and has full Redundant Energy, her Resonance Skill is replaced with Resonance Skill Crisis Response Protocol.

Hold Resonance Skill to enter Ready Stance. While in Ready Stance, Zani is immune to interruption. This state ends early if Zani is switched off the field. After releasing Resonance Skill button or when the stance duration ends, consume all Redundant Energy to cast Targeted Action, dealing Spectro DMG, which is also considered Spectro Frazzle DMG.

When attacked by an enemy in while in Ready Stance, reduce this instance of damage by 100% and consume all Redundant Energy to cast Forcible Riposte, dealing Spectro DMG (also considered Spectro Frazzle DMG), Stagnating the target, and further reducing their Vibration Strength by 5%. DMG taken by Zani is reduced by 30% within the next 2s.

Casting Targeted Action or Forcible Riposte sends Zani into Sunburst mode and inflicts a stack of Heliacal Ember upon the target on hit. The last stage of the attack recovers Blaze.



Sunburst

The Spectro Frazzle DMG dealt by Zani to the target is Amplified by 20%.

texts.name: There Will Be A Light
texts.description:
Heliacal Ember

When Zani is in the team and a nearby Resonator inflicts Spectro Frazzle upon a target, immediately consume all Spectro Frazzle stacks and trigger the corresponding DMG, then convert Spectro Frazzle into an equal number of Heliacal Embers. Every time the conversion happens, Zani obtains Blaze based on the stacks of Heliacal Ember inflicted. Heliacal Ember is capped at 60 stacks, with each stack lasting for 6s. Heliacal Ember stacks are counted toward the Spectro Frazzle stacks for the Eternal Radiance Sonata Effect.



Scorching Light

When Zani is in Inferno Mode, Heavy Slash - Daybreak, Heavy Slash - Dawning, Heavy Slash - Nightfall, and Heavy Slash - Lightsmash become available, which deal Spectro DMG that is considered both Heavy Attack DMG and Spectro Frazzle DMG.

When Blaze is no less than 30, Resonance Skill Standard Defense Protocol is replaced with Resonance Skill Scorching Light.

Hold Resonance Skill to enter Ready Stance, during which Zani is immune to interruption. This state ends early when Zani is switched off the field. While in Ready Stance, release Resonance Skill button within a certain time to consume Blaze and perform Heavy Slash - Daybreak.

When attacked in a certain time after entering Ready Stance, reduce this instance of damage by 100% and Stagnate nearby targets, then perform Heavy Slash - Lightsmash, consuming Blazes and further reducing their Vibration Strength by 10%. Zani's DMG taken within the next 2s is reduced by 30%.

After casting Heavy Slash - Lightsmash, Basic Attack is replaced with Heavy Slash - Nightfall, consuming up to 40 Blazes on hit, with each Blaze increasing the DMG Multiplier of Heavy Slash - Nightfall. If Heavy Slash - Nightfall Stage 1 is interrupted, {Cus:Ipt,Touch=tap PC=press Gamepad=press} Basic Attack again to cast Heavy Slash - Nightfall Stage 2.

Upon releasing the button after a certain time or when Ready Stance ends, immediately perform Heavy Slash - Nightfall.

When Blaze is no less than 30, Basic Attack is replaced with Heavy Slash - Daybreak. After entering Inferno Mode, casting Basic Attack immediately replaces the current Basic Attack with Resonance Skill Scorching Light. Hold Basic Attack to enter Ready Stance.

After performing Heavy Slash - Daybreak, {Cus:Ipt,Touch=tap PC=press Gamepad=press} Basic Attack immediately to perform Heavy Slash - Dawning at the cost of Blaze.

After performing Heavy Slash - Dawning, Basic Attack is replaced with Heavy Slash - Nightfall.

If Basic Attack is not replaced with Heavy Slash - Nightfall after a successful Dodge and Zani has no less than 30 Blazes, {Cus:Ipt,Touch=tap PC=press Gamepad=press} Normal Attack within a certain time to perform Heavy Slash - Lightsmash at the cost of Blazes.



Redundant Energy

Zani can hold up to 100 Redundant Energy.

Obtain Redundant Energy when Normal Attacks hit a target.

Obtain Redundant Energy when casting Intro Skill Immediate Execution.

Obtain Redundant Energy when casting Resonance Skill Standard Defense Protocol.

Obtain Redundant Energy when casting Pinpoint Strike.

Cannot obtain Redundant Energy while in Inferno Mode.



Blaze

Blaze is capped at 100 when not in Inferno Mode.

Blaze is capped at 150 in Inferno Mode.

Casting Targeted Action or Forcible Riposte grants 10 Blazes.

Every stack of Heliacal Ember converted from Spectro Frazzle grants 5 Blazes.

Casting Resonance Liberation Rekindle grants 50 Blazes.

texts.name: Between Dawn and Dusk
texts.description:
Rekindle

Deal Spectro DMG and enter Inferno Mode, increasing Max Blaze from 100 to 150 and granting 50 Blazes. When in Inferno Mode, the DMG Multiplier of Basic Attack is increased.



The Last Stand

When in Inferno Mode, Resonance Liberation The Last Stand becomes available when Blaze is lower than 30 or after 8s in Inferno Mode.

Casting Resonance Liberation The Last Stand deals Spectro DMG and ends the Inferno Mode.

texts.name: Immediate Execution
texts.description: Attack the target, dealing Spectro DMG.

texts.name: There Will Be A Light
texts.description:
Heliacal Ember

When Zani is in the team and a nearby Resonator inflicts Spectro Frazzle upon a target, immediately consume all Spectro Frazzle stacks and trigger the corresponding DMG, then convert Spectro Frazzle into an equal number of Heliacal Embers. Every time the conversion happens, Zani obtains Blaze based on the stacks of Heliacal Ember inflicted. Heliacal Ember is capped at 60 stacks, with each stack lasting for 6s. Heliacal Ember stacks are counted toward the Spectro Frazzle stacks for the Eternal Radiance Sonata Effect.



Scorching Light

When Zani is in Inferno Mode, Heavy Slash - Daybreak, Heavy Slash - Dawning, Heavy Slash - Nightfall, and Heavy Slash - Lightsmash become available, which deal Spectro DMG that is considered both Heavy Attack DMG and Spectro Frazzle DMG.

When Blaze is no less than 30, Resonance Skill Standard Defense Protocol is replaced with Resonance Skill Scorching Light.

Hold Resonance Skill to enter Ready Stance, during which Zani is immune to interruption. This state ends early when Zani is switched off the field. While in Ready Stance, release Resonance Skill button within a certain time to consume Blaze and perform Heavy Slash - Daybreak.

When attacked in a certain time after entering Ready Stance, reduce this instance of damage by 100% and Stagnate nearby targets, then perform Heavy Slash - Lightsmash, consuming Blazes and further reducing their Vibration Strength by 10%. Zani's DMG taken within the next 2s is reduced by 30%.

After casting Heavy Slash - Lightsmash, Basic Attack is replaced with Heavy Slash - Nightfall, consuming up to 40 Blazes on hit, with each Blaze increasing the DMG Multiplier of Heavy Slash - Nightfall. If Heavy Slash - Nightfall Stage 1 is interrupted, {Cus:Ipt,Touch=tap PC=press Gamepad=press} Basic Attack again to cast Heavy Slash - Nightfall Stage 2.

Upon releasing the button after a certain time or when Ready Stance ends, immediately perform Heavy Slash - Nightfall.

When Blaze is no less than 30, Basic Attack is replaced with Heavy Slash - Daybreak. After entering Inferno Mode, casting Basic Attack immediately replaces the current Basic Attack with Resonance Skill Scorching Light. Hold Basic Attack to enter Ready Stance.

After performing Heavy Slash - Daybreak, {Cus:Ipt,Touch=tap PC=press Gamepad=press} Basic Attack immediately to perform Heavy Slash - Dawning at the cost of Blaze.

After performing Heavy Slash - Dawning, Basic Attack is replaced with Heavy Slash - Nightfall.

If Basic Attack is not replaced with Heavy Slash - Nightfall after a successful Dodge and Zani has no less than 30 Blazes, {Cus:Ipt,Touch=tap PC=press Gamepad=press} Normal Attack within a certain time to perform Heavy Slash - Lightsmash at the cost of Blazes.



Redundant Energy

Zani can hold up to 100 Redundant Energy.

Obtain Redundant Energy when Normal Attacks hit a target.

Obtain Redundant Energy when casting Intro Skill Immediate Execution.

Obtain Redundant Energy when casting Resonance Skill Standard Defense Protocol.

Obtain Redundant Energy when casting Pinpoint Strike.

Cannot obtain Redundant Energy while in Inferno Mode.



Blaze

Blaze is capped at 100 when not in Inferno Mode.

Blaze is capped at 150 in Inferno Mode.

Casting Targeted Action or Forcible Riposte grants 10 Blazes.

Every stack of Heliacal Ember converted from Spectro Frazzle grants 5 Blazes.

Casting Resonance Liberation Rekindle grants 50 Blazes.

texts.name: Immediate Execution
texts.description: Attack the target, dealing Spectro DMG.

texts.name: When the Alarm Clock Rings
texts.description:
Casting Targeted Action or Forcible Riposte gives a 50% Spectro DMG Bonus for 14s.

Resonance Skill Heavy Slash - Nightfall can't be interrupted.

texts.name: Stale Bread With Energy Drink
texts.description:
Crit. Rate is increased by 20%.

The DMG Multiplier of Targeted Action and Forcible Riposte is increased by 80%.

texts.name: Each Day A New Commute
texts.description: When in Inferno Mode, every 1 consumed increases the last stage DMG Multiplier of the subsequent Resonance Liberation The Last Stand by 8%, maxed at 1200%.

texts.name: More Efficiency, Less Drama
texts.description: When Intro Skill Immediate Execution is cast, the ATK of all Resonators in the team is increased by 20% for 30s.

texts.name: Delivered In Full On Time
texts.description: The DMG Multiplier of Resonance Liberation Rekindle is increased by 120%.

texts.name: First Things First? Clock Out!
texts.description:
The DMG Multipliers of Heavy Slash - Daybreak, Heavy Slash- Dawning, Heavy Slash - Nightfall, and Heavy Slash - Lightsmash are increased by 40%. Every Blaze consumed increases the DMG Multiplier of Heavy Slash - Nightfall by 40% on hit.

Gain following effects when in Inferno Mode: 

- When Blaze is lower than 70, restore 70 Blazes immediately. This effect is triggered once in Inferno Mode.

- Within 8s after entering Inferno Mode, Zani will remain standing with at least 1 HP if hit by a fatal blow.
